info.name: Half-Aeterna
info.description: Half-elves with innate magical talent from Aeterna lineage
info.author: Sklolss

description.p: Half-Aeterna names blend human and elven influences, often melodic with soft consonants.

Male Names: Arion, Elyas, Faelar, Kaelen, Lorian, Soren, Theron
Female Names: Aelith, Elara, Lyraena, Sylria, Thalia, Virelle, Ysabel

Ability Score Increase.Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age.Half-Aeterna mature at human rates but live 180-250 years.
Alignment.Inheriting Aeterna curiosity, they tend toward chaotic alignments.
Size.Half-Aeterna are slender and graceful. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Arcane AffinityYou gain proficiency in Arcana and one wizard cantrip. Aeterna BloodlineYou have advantage against charm and sleep effects.

description.p: You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill and learn one wizard cantrip of your choice.
You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or put to sleep by magic.
